divs: sighting detailsat around 8pm, myself and two friends were standing outside in the one of said friends yards. we were talking about who knows what when friend 1 says "what the f*** is that?" friend 2 and myself turned to see a brilliant white star\ball\sphere\dot in the sky. it appeared to be above the trees and off to the south of us. it had a cone of light shining towards the ground much like a streetlight and fog-like light around it. the "streetlight" did not make it the ground but instead faded out above the trees. after about 10 seconds the star\ball\sphere\dot disappeared. the fog and "streetlight" slowly disappeared after about 45 seconds. it just seemed to fade from the cone shape to a smudge in the sky. i don't know what it was but i have never in my life seen light that brilliant or light fade out or drift off like smoke.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Worcester
There was one other sighting in Worcester on or around September 19th 2009
Summary: Bright white sphere and cone of light.
